eLabel.text: Fr weniger Transparenz in der Benutzeroberflche, in /usr/share/enigma2/Blue-Line-OE-4ATV/DEV/ diePixmaps: bg1280.png und bg1920.png kopieren und in /usr/share/enigma2/Blue-Line-OE-4ATV/menu einfgen. - Benutzer Oberflche neustarten.
Dieser Skin kann in Men -> Einstellungen -> Bedienung und Oberflche, angepasst werden. Dort findet ihr auch Infos zum Einstellen Des Wetters in der 2en Infobar.

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 35 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list height item listsize = (wsizex - 20, 70) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 10 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() + 10 orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 10) wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*40 if (lenlist > 160): lenlist = 160 if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 10 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight + 25) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(110, 8 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(20, 10 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(20, 10 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(20, 10 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight + 20)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

screen.name: ExtraMessageBox
screen.title: Extra Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["message"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... if self["message"].getText() != "": textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 60) else: textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 4)
count = len(self.list) if count > 7: count = 7 offset = 48 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (640 > wsizex): wsizex = 640 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["message"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 48 * count) self["menu"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1] + 10)) self["menu"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex), (1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

screen.name: doFlashImage
screen.title: Flash On the fly (select a image)

eLabel.text: Gelbe Taste Drcken, um die Skinparts auszuwhlen

eLabel.text: Fr die Wetteranzeige in der 2.nd Infobar sind einige Schritte ntig.

Menu/Einstellungen/Bedienung und Oberflche/OSD - 2.Infoleiste Sendungsinformationen ndern in -2.Infoleiste INFO. Von System Plugins laden wir uns den WeatherComponentHandler runter. WeatherComponentHandler/Menu, dann Grn Hinzufgen. Wenn ihr den Ort Eingegeben habt, ein mal runter auf Location-Code. Gelb fr Code suchen, mit Grn (OK)besttigen, wichtig wieder OK. Noch wichtiger mit Rot zurck, sonst msst ihr wieder von vorne anfangen. Jetzt mit Exit beenden, Benutzer Oberflche neustarten, eventuell kompletter Neustart.
Select your skin and press OK to activate the selected skin
